html: 7.12.17  12:52 pm   If I'm writing out a score to a song, how do I know if I should make it 6/8 vs 3/4 time? (Does it even matter?) I know, traditionally, 6/8 almost has a 2/4 feel with two "pulses" per bar (ONE two three FOUR five six) and 3/4 usually has the three distinct "pulses".. but the rhythm for this particular song doesn't have 2 pulses or 3 pulses uniformly in every single measure.
